sentences.en: All of this has produced a noticeable aggressiveness in many women.
sentences.cn: 这一切使很多妇女明显地变得敢作敢为了.

sentences.en: And though he acted with what seemed at the time like blitzkrieg aggressiveness , he regretted in later years that he hadn't moved even faster.
sentences.cn: 虽然他的行动在当时看来就像一场闪电战, 但他后来却后悔自己没能更快.

sentences.en: DOI dual regulated aggressiveness in isolation mice.
sentences.cn: DOI双向调节隔离小鼠的攻击行为.

sentences.en: Her aggressiveness made it difficult for him to explain his own feelings.
sentences.cn: 她咄咄逼人的态度让他难以解释自己的感情。

sentences.en: His dunk is full of aggressiveness.
sentences.cn: 他的扣篮充满了侵略性.

sentences.en: His sensitivity to errors and mistakes sometimes tempers his aggressiveness.
sentences.cn: 对错误的敏感有时使他处事激烈.

sentences.en: Hormonal aspects of passivity and aggressiveness in boys.
sentences.cn: 研究男孩身上的消极以及积极的荷尔蒙问题.

sentences.en: In her words, it boiled down to five factors: appearance, personality, aggressiveness, executive stature, and promotability.
sentences.cn: 用她的话说, 它可归结为五个因素; 外表, 个性, 进取心, 行政管理能力和可发展性.

sentences.en: In our pioneering days this aggressiveness was essential to survival.
sentences.cn: 在开拓时期,这种进攻性是生存的必要条件.

sentences.en: Scientists today aggressiveness in boys is also caused by mothers.
sentences.cn: 但今天科学家们确认男孩的进取性也是由母亲造成的.

sentences.en: The mottos our company sticks to are union, pragmatism, diligence, and aggressiveness.
sentences.cn: 团结务实, 拼搏进取,是我们公司得企业精神.

sentences.en: The thunder bastard teak has aggressiveness, we suffered not the small hardship.
sentences.cn: 雷吉纳非常有侵略性, 我们吃到了不小的苦头.

sentences.en: They say aggressiveness in boys is also caused by mothers.
sentences.cn: 他们指出男孩的进取心也是由母亲养成的.

sentences.en: We have to be determined to reduce the criminals'aggressiveness.
sentences.cn: 我们要坚决扑灭这些犯罪分子的毒焰.
